name: Xanka
description: Xanka is a small, unaligned construct, notable for its central globe that absorbs and degrades nonmagical objects. With average physical attributes but good Dexterity, it looms as a potential threat due to its unique abilities to devastate structures.
memorable: Noteworthy for its ability to absorb and dismantle nonmagical weapons and objects, making it a unique opponent in combat.
goals: To destroy nonmagical objects and defenses, engaging in relentless activity as it doesn’t require sustenance.
relations: Typically encountered alone but may be created by powerful construct designers.
environment: Commonly found in areas where nonmagical constructs or objects exist.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage, as well as various conditions.
weaknesses: Limited mobility and combat versatility due to low Strength and Intelligence scores.
attacks: Utilizes its Dismantling Leg to strike, capable of dealing bludgeoning damage while also absorbing objects.
most_powerful_ability: The Absorb ability allows it to deteriorate nonmagical items, granting it a significant tactical advantage.
senses: Xanka has blindsight up to 120 feet, enabling it to perceive its surroundings without relying on sight.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its Construct Nature.
Can produce an area-of-effect attack with Release Energy.
Can destroy a 1-foot cube of materials with its Absorb ability.
Only functions as a combatant against nonmagical threats.
test_queries: Xanka the destructor of nonmagical objects
